document_type.description: The type of document. This could be one of the following: letter, picture, receipt, screenshot, blank page, or other types.

ocr_text.description: The text extracted from the document using OCR.

tags.description: A list of tags describing this image, to help with categorization. For example, 'photograph of a ...', 'charts', 'letter', 'table', 'handwritten', 'figures', 'visual elements', etc.
